about_the_game:
Prepare to lead your favorite school to championship glory as you experience the most realistic college football simulation on the planet. Customize your game world to suit your desires and create your ultimate college football universe.

Create custom plays and playbooks, hit the recruiting trail, gameplan with your staff and call the winning plays on Saturdays! Will you become a legendary coach with a full trophy case? Challenge yourself to have the most successful career ever in college football in the premier college football dynasty mode. Link your DDS: College Football 2025 game world to our Draft Day Sports: Pro Football series for seamless integration of the two games for the ultimate football universe!

Explore all the exciting new features this season including the biggest one of all - speed! The game has been rebuilt to make screen render times super fast making your navigating around the massive game world instantaneous and allowing you to sim multiple seasons in just minutes. New positions have been added to your coaching staff along with new impacts from the staff on gameday making carefully choosing your staff a major importance in the game. New coach talks allow coaches to interact with the players in the game as well making your football universe seem even more realistic. All of this in addition to other new items make this the deepest college football game available today. Full almanac, deep stat tracking, custom plays, playbooks, gameplans and a fun recruiting system makes this the game for you if you are looking for a deep and realistic franchise mode in college football gaming.

name: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2025

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2025 - $29.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Draft Day Sports: College Football 2025

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: XP/Vista/Win7/Win8.X/Win10/Win11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64 bit
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 display capable of running 32-bit color or higher
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: XP/Vista/Win7/Win8.X/Win10/Win11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64 bit
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 display capable of running 32-bit color or higher
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2025 puts you in the role of head coach for your favorite college football team. Recruit, gameplan, hire a successful staff and make the right calls on the field to lead your team to the top of the ranks and the college football championship.
